I must of missed this Who is Shadowcasers son? Soory.

Polar Claw <cycodrone@...> wrote:Shadowcaster figured Rattrap was in shock or
something, after all, it's not every day that a bot's
father comes back from the matrix.  Hearing the
comotion, he reached through the matrix to all the
sparks of those in the midst of it, sending
reinforcing thoughts of 'hang in there' to Kitkat
while she was in the CR Chamber, comforting and
reassuring thoughts to Camoflage that she wasn't going
to be in trouble. He then turned to Blackfang.

"Seems like a little friend of yours and you are also
in for a reunion. Incidentally I'm pretty sure you
might wanna go easy on the kid." he said smiling
calmly. Then sensing Wolfblade's thoughts, he spoke
through the matrix directly spaark to spark "You know,
sometimes, the battlefield gets put on the kids. At
times as a parent you worry, but the funny thing is,
they turn out ok. I mean, look at Rattrap- the kid was
sweet and innocent-" Shadowcaster cut himself off in a
chuckle beforee resuming "Ok, so he's not so sweet and
innocent as he was as a kid, but the fact is that he's
turned out to be one of the Maximals' finest spies and
soldiers, and I couldn't be more proud of him."

At this, his thoughts turned to his son. When Primus
ressurected him as guardian of his children, he'd
accepted the task without hesitation, nor knowing the
time period nor place he'd be sent to.  He never in
his wildest dreams imagined he'd be arriving after his
death, nor he'd get to do something most parents can
only dream of- get another chance with their children.

--- airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
Windlord:

Windlord smiled when the little one huged him and he
huged her "I 
missed you too, little one"said with a wide
smile"BlackFang is 
around there... perhaps.. Nighlight won't mind to take
you with 
him... I guess that you aren't in troubles... Little
one"

said with an

don't
